name: Slapkeeper
description:
What do you do when everything is breaking around you? You perform percussive maintenance!

In Slapkeeper you fix your appliances with a slap! When everything breaks down you have just a couple of seconds to run up to your home apparatus before it explodes!

99% of assets have been created by me during the Global Game Jam 2020. 3D Assets courtesy of Kenney. Thanks!

Slap at it!
